description:
At Hearn Law Firm, PLLC, our sole focus is to help people in Blue Mountain, Mississippi, navigate difficult situations. Suffering a personal injury or being charged with a crime both call into question someone's future. We have spent decades putting people on a path to a better tomorrow through securing compensation for their losses or clearing their name in a criminal case.

The founder of our law firm, Philip C. Hearn, is well-known for his compassionate representation. He approaches every case the same way: with a passion for doing what is best for the client. In fact, for his accomplishments and exceptional customer service, Mr. Hearn has earned an Avvo "Superb" rating and a "Distinguished" rating* from Martindale-Hubbell.

Clients who come to us receive:

  • A free initial consultation
  • Honest advice on next steps
  • Personalized legal strategy

Our practice areas are comprehensive. In personal injury, we have litigated and negotiated awards in cases that include defective drugs, mass torts, wrongful death, motor vehicle accidents, birth injuries and medical malpractice. Our criminal defense caseload involves state and federal matters that range from robbery and domestic violence to manslaughter and computer fraud. Hearn Law Firm, PLLC, also handles general civil litigation and appeals.
